document.full_text: the idaho legislature on tuesday gave final approval to a measure that would outlaw abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy and subject abortion providers to criminal prosecution and civil lawsuits.
document.title: idaho lawmakers vote to ban abortion after 20 weeks
lines_and_colors: the idaho legislature on tuesday gave final approval to a measure that would outlaw abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy and subject abortion providers to criminal prosecution and civil lawsuits.
